name: More Monsters, Please
description:
Controller Required

Sharing a controller, you must collaborate together to assemble the monster's orders and feed as many as you can before it loses patience! Would be a lot easier if the parts weren't squirming all over the table...

Created for the Critical Hit Pre-Jam in 2014 with Construct 2. Theme was Hybrid.

Team:

  • Alicia Fortier: Game Design, Game Programming
  • Morgan Lang: Art
